item.description:
►Update: We're going to meet on the football field instead (on the maps where it says "Russel Field") because the baseball diamond is covered in snow holes.

We're going to meet at Russel Field this time for our Friday evening games of illuminated Ultimate Frisbee madness. We'll be meeting at 7pm and playing for a couple hours. Most likely we'll head over to a bar or restaurant afterwards to have drinks or food (Bertucci's, anyone?)

For those taking public transportation, follow the map to walk to Russel Field via the path from Alewife T Station, OR, take the 83 bus from either Porter or Central Square. For those driving, park in the public parking lot alongside the playing field. For those walking, wear a hat and gloves!


http://img246.imagesh...


http://img175.imagesh...

Be sure to dress warmly. I have a couple extra pairs of hats and gloves that I'll bring just in case anyone doesn't have any. Even though we'll bring a first aid kit, be sure to wear light colored clothes and cleats if you have them.

We'll provide the glowsticks and frisbees. Feel free to email us with questions. See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be chasing illuminated frisbees like giddy moths.
item.why: We're awesome... read the Bostonist article on the front page of our Meetup.
item.name: Illuminated Frisbee on Russel Field
